title: Feature Request: Shared username/password
author: flamery
body_snippet:
This feature could be useful, my company uses radius/tacacs for most access, I have half a dozen or so different accounts per customer with anywhere from 10-100 connections per customer.

When a password expires I then have to go and update all of the connections passwords.

My suggestion is, when you create a new connection, the option could be to enter a username or password (as it currently is) or a drop down list to select a shared username/password pair. When the password changes we jus...
